mapper.select: SELECT USER_MESSAGE.USER_CODE_FROM as userCodeFrom , USER_INFO.USER_ID as userCodeTo , USER_MESSAGE.MESSAGE_CODE as messageCode , USER_MESSAGE.MESSAGE_TITLE as messageTitle , USER_MESSAGE.MESSAGE_DESC as messageDesc , TO_CHAR(USER_MESSAGE.MESSAGE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as messageTime , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_MESSAGE WHERE USER_MESSAGE.USER_CODE_TO = USER_INFO.USER_CODE) as totalCount FROM USER_MESSAGE, USER_INFO WHERE USER_MESSAGE.USER_CODE_TO = USER_INFO.USER_CODE
